author: veithen
msg: Eliminated a package cycle in axiom-api, so that we now again have a perfect API layering: ext - util - mime - om+soap+attachments - osgi.

author: esjewett
msg: [ESME-287] [ESME-289] Switch tag view timeline to the standard format and use comet, so new messages with a tag automagically show up on the page.
